column1: The Purple Pig////Holy smokes was this place delicious! It over exceeding my expectations. I ordered their octopus with green beans
column2: fingerlings potatoes and green salsa. Literally the best grilled octopus I've had in my life! It was perfectly cooked not chewy and the flavors were amazing. I literally had a foodgasm. I also ordered their roasted bone marrow with herbs. Wow! That little lemony salad was the perfect balance to garnish on top of the bread w/ the bone marrow. My mouth is watering thinking about this dish as well. Customer service was fantastic one of the bartenders made made sure I was well taken care even with the high volume. The bar area is first come first serve so be prepared to wait a bit. This is a must if you come to Chicago!
